code: import Card from"../UI/Card";import classes from"./ProductItem.module.css";import{useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{cartActions}from"../../store/cart-slice";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var ProductItem=function ProductItem(props){var dispatch=useDispatch();var title=props.title,price=props.price,description=props.description,id=props.id;var addToCartHandler=function addToCartHandler(){dispatch(cartActions.addItemToCart({id:id,title:title,price:price}));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:classes.item,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:classes.price,children:["$",price.toFixed(2)]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:classes.actions,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:addToCartHandler,children:"Add to Cart"})})]})});};export default ProductItem;
